name: Star Wars Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars Jedi Knight - Dark Forces 2/JK.EXE

files.swdfii: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- swdfii: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars Jedi Knight - Dark Forces 2/JK.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing...
    executable: swdfii
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
